title: The Favorites - NFL Week 6 Gambling Preview
itunes:title: The Favorites - NFL Week 6 Gambling Preview
description:
Jon Gruden is out. Urban Meyer is not... yet. The NFL season is getting weird, and Chad Millman and Simon Hunter of the Action Network return to preview all things betting in the world of the National Football League this week. Together they discuss value on the lowly Texans, a sell high spot for the Bucs and climb into the foxhole with Matt Nagy's Chicago Bears. They also give out their favorite early picks for Week 6 as they touch on every game from Thursday Night Football to Monday Night Football, as producer Matt Mitchell soaks in all the glory of his suddenly ascendant Buffalo Bills.

TNF - 8 MIN

MIA JAX - 13 MIN

KC WFT - 26 MIN

MIN CAR - 28 MIN

LAC BAL - 31 MIN

CIN DET - 35 MIN

GB CHI - 37 MIN

AZ CLE - 40 MIN

DAL NE - 42 MIN

LV DEN - 45 MIN

SEA PIT - 49 MIN

MNF - 50 MIN

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
